name: apex-mcp
description: Manage your X (Twitter) account with AI through Apex API
long_description: A powerful MCP extension that provides complete X/Twitter management capabilities including tweeting, replying, searching, and generating AI-powered responses. Built using Apex social media infrastructure.

tools.name: get_tweet
tools.description: Get a tweet by its ID with full details

tools.name: search_tweets
tools.description: Search for tweets with advanced filtering options

tools.name: generate_reply
tools.description: Generate AI-powered reply suggestions for text/images

tools.name: generate_reply_to_tweet
tools.description: Generate reply suggestion for a specific tweet

tools.name: post_tweet
tools.description: Post a new tweet with optional images

tools.name: post_reply_to_tweet
tools.description: Post a reply to an existing tweet

tools.name: add_list_member
tools.description: Add a member to an X/Twitter list

tools.name: get_list_members
tools.description: Get members of a list with pagination support

tools.name: get_user_lists
tools.description: Get all lists owned by the authenticated user

tools.name: get_list
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific list

tools.name: follow_user
tools.description: Follow a user on Twitter/X by their user ID

tools.name: unfollow_user
tools.description: Unfollow a user on Twitter/X by their user ID

tools.name: get_user_followers
tools.description: Get a paginated list of a user's followers

tools.name: get_user_following
tools.description: Get a paginated list of users that a user is following

apex_api_key.title: Apex API Key
apex_api_key.description: Your Apex API key for authentication. Get one at https://apexagents.ai

apex_api_url.title: Apex API URL
apex_api_url.description: The Apex API base URL provided with your API key
